title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.body: Hi, we've added Waaree back. We can't thank you enough for your patience. You are real heroes to us. If you see a wrong allotment status as **Not Applied**, please use the **Incorrect? Reload** button available in the three-dot menu on the right side of the concerned allotment. Thanks!
data.markdown_body: Hi, we've added Waaree back. We can't thank you enough for your patience. You are real heroes to us. If you see a wrong allotment status as **Not Applied**, please use the **Incorrect? Reload** button available in the three-dot menu on the right side of the concerned allotment. Thanks!
